productInfo.name: Wooden Angled Chair
productInfo.shortDescription: A sturdy wooden angled chair that welcomes every guest into your living space in style. Includes a matching movable leg rest.
productInfo.longDescription: Give your living room a bold new look with the modern and comfortable blue armchair. The armchair features a compact design, comfortable oversized pillow, easy to clean polyester fabric, and button tufts along the lower backrest. The armchair's modern styling is complemented with durable light brown wooden legs. No assembly required.

productInfo.name: Wooden Cafe Chair
productInfo.shortDescription: This classic chair marries form and function together to provide timeless appeal, comfort and stability.
productInfo.longDescription: The classic Wooden Cafe Chair marries form and function together to provide timeless appeal and sophistication with comfort and stability. Designed with a broad concave backrest and a generous curved seat the contoured form allows the body relax through extended periods of sitting. The Wooden Cafe Chairâ€™s organic, streamlined shape allows it to fit in natually in any kind of setting, be it a restaurant, cafe or at your breakfast table.

productInfo.name: Modern Pendant Light
productInfo.shortDescription: A versatile pendant light that creates a modern atmosphere in your living room.
productInfo.longDescription: Combine style and function by using pendant lighting in your living space. Use individually to project onto your decor, or use in sets based on your light coverage needs. Height adjustable.

productInfo.name: Nordic Lamp
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern and sleek lamp that brightens up and accents your home's living room.
productInfo.longDescription: Light up and modernize your living room decor with the Nordic lamp. The lamp features a chrome base, a high quality lamp shade, and an open design that's easy to keep clean. Some assembly required.

productInfo.name: Accent Mirror
productInfo.shortDescription: A decorative wall mirror that can be used as an accent in a contemporary living room.
productInfo.longDescription: Bring your living room together in style with a wall mirror that contains just the right amount of subtle, effective accents. Includes hanging wire. Hang vertically for optimum effect.

productInfo.name: Framed Mirror
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern wall mirror that can be used to open up your living room space.
productInfo.longDescription: Create the illusion of a farther-reaching living space with this wall mirror, complete with its full length frame. Its dark brown surrounds complement any living room decor. Includes hanging wire. Hang vertically or horizontally, or lean against a wall.

productInfo.name: Makeup Mirror
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern makeup mirror that sits elegantly on any bathroom counter.
productInfo.longDescription: Look your best no matter what the occasion with this stylish chrome makeup mirror. It sits upon its chrome pedestal and rotates 360 degrees for optimal viewing. The mirror's spacious surface reflects at actual size. No assembly required.

productInfo.name: Bender Wall Toothbrush Holder
productInfo.shortDescription: Modern toothbrush holder that mounts to any wall.
productInfo.longDescription: Simple and sleek tooth brush holder that suits any bathroom decor. Fashionable so your toothbrushes feel like royalty. Mounts to any wall quickly and easily.

productInfo.name: Kerry"s Glass Soap Dispenser
productInfo.shortDescription: Classic hand soap dispenser.
productInfo.longDescription: Wash your hands in style with this classic looking liquid hand soap dispenser. A contemporary design that accents any design. Made with elegant frosted glass and sparkling chrome.

productInfo.name: Style Home Large Ash Wood Chest of Drawers
productInfo.shortDescription: Large 4 drawer chest of drawer made of ash wood.
productInfo.longDescription: Made of dark ash wood, this chest of drawer is as hardy as it looks. 4 large drawers fitted with smooth railed grid for easy opening and closing. Ash wood cannot be easily scratched or cracked, the chest of drawer will keep looking new for ages.

productInfo.name: Style Home Intree Chest of Drawers
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern chest of drawer with 6 split width drawer made of Maple wood.
productInfo.longDescription: This is a simple elegant design chest of drawer from Style Home made from Maple wood. If you want something that is not expensive but will last for a long time, this is the perfect chest of drawer.

productInfo.name: Luncheon Table
productInfo.shortDescription: A cozy dining table that is perfect for afternoon luncheons. It fits in with any home's decor with its natural styling, while comfortably seating 4.
productInfo.longDescription: With its versatile and subtle styling, this dining room table makes the most out of your living space. Its table top features durable and easy-to-clean tempered glass, and its stylish angled legs draws attention to its cozy features. Seats 4.

productInfo.name: Patio Table
productInfo.shortDescription: A versatile patio table that is suitable for the outdoors. Its dark styling perfectly complements any porch, patio, or deck, either on its own, or while inside a gazebo.
productInfo.longDescription: No matter what the location, this sturdy, wooden patio table features a weatherproof design that can be kept outside year-round, or featured inside for extra table-space in the winter. Its slotted tabletop whisks away the rain, and its extra-wide seating comfortably seats 4.

productInfo.name: Espresso Table
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern table that is perfect for serving your guests an after-dinner coffee, tea, and dessert.
productInfo.longDescription: Add a sleek flare to your outdoor decor and host with style with this espresso table. Its modern styling fits in wherever it's needed, either as primary seating, or as an accent. Its table top features durable and easy-to-clean tempered glass. Seats 4.

productInfo.name: Pub Table
productInfo.shortDescription: A compact pub table that provides modern styling and seating for your kitchen or basement bar.
productInfo.longDescription: Perfect for after-dinner drinks in a cozy, intimate setting, this modern pub table features a white top and polished chrome base that provides a bar-height table. Its vinyl-coated top is durable and easy to clean. Seats 4.

productInfo.name: Wooden Dining Chair
productInfo.shortDescription: A simple and sturdy wooden dining chair that welcomes every guest into your living space.
productInfo.longDescription: Give your living space an open and welcome feel with the wooden dining chair. The chair features a simple and sturdy design. Its wooden surface is easy to clean and comfortable to sit on, and its compact design is stackable for easy storage. The chair's simple styling is complemented with steel legs and rubber feet. Some assembly required.

productInfo.name: Ant Chair
productInfo.shortDescription: A modern ant chair that combines form and function to make your dining experience comfortable and elegant.
productInfo.longDescription: Treat your guests to the ultimate in comfort and modern style with the ant chair. Its shape is designed to suit your modern living decor, while providing longlasting comfort. Its wooden surface is easy to clean, and its compact design is stackable for easy storage. The chair's classic styling is complemented with chrome legs and rubber feet. Some assembly required.

productInfo.name: Dark Wooden Chair
productInfo.shortDescription: A dark wooden chair that provides ample comfort and durability to complement your warm living area.
productInfo.longDescription: Give your living space extra warmth with the dark wooden chair. Its shape is simple and elegant to sit on, while its warm tones bring together any living space. Its wooden surface is easy to clean, and its compact design is stackable for easy storage. The chair's classic styling is complemented with brushed steel legs and rubber feet. Some assembly required.

productInfo.name: StyleHome Comfy Dining chair
productInfo.shortDescription: A dining chair with foam sit and back rest
productInfo.longDescription: Dining chair from StyleHome made for utmost comfort. Foam covered with fabric on back rest and the sit, this looks great and feels great in around any dining table.

productInfo.name: Dark Brown Wood-grained Cabinet
productInfo.shortDescription: Wood-grained cabinets add an elegant and warm design to your home's contempory or traditional kitchen.
productInfo.longDescription: Cabinets that feature wooden construction for both the cabinetry and the shelving, ideal for long-term durability. The versatile hinges are fully adjustable, self-closing, and can be installed so that the door hinges either left or right.

productInfo.name: Dark Brown Wood-grained Countertop
productInfo.shortDescription: Wood-grained countertops add an elegant and warm design to your home's contempory or traditional kitchen.
productInfo.longDescription: Countertops that feature wooden construction throughout, ideal for long-term durability. Finished and sealed in your choice of color, these countertops are heat, scratch, stain, and water resistant. Able to accomodate any size cabinetry and undermount sinks by simply cutting where needed.
